heroes.name: Atlantean Armor Aquaman
heroes.description: Atlantean Armor Aquaman heals his whole team upon using any of his abilites. The amount of HP restored is based on his Attack stat, therefore it's beneficial to build him as a damage dealer with high Attack.

passives.name: The Waterbearer
passives.description: [150% of Attack] Healing for 7 seconds after any Ability.

passives.name: Power Lock Arrow
passives.description: As he tags out, Green Arrow fires an arrow that temporarily stops his opponent's Power generation.
effects: 6 seconds of Power Lock on opponent

passives.name: WayneTech
passives.description: Batman and his teammates deal increased hazard damage. Tech and Agility heroes gain increased defense and health when they enter combat.

passives.name: Fear Multi-takedown
passives.description: Batman or any teammate regenerates health and power when knocking out an opponent.

passives.name: Freeflow Counter
passives.description: The Arkham Knight can interrupt and counterattack Specials from Metahuman opponents, leaving them stunned for a few seconds.

passives.name: Kryptonian Armor
passives.description: Superman boosts team defense and ignores damage from the first Special Ability of every battle. Maybe ineffective in Raid Boss battles.
effects: Ignore damage from opponent's first Special
+20% Defense for team

passives.name: Dex-Starr
passives.description: Dex-Starr is ordered to assist on battle start and whenever a new teammate tags in. Buff on active teammate may be a Reflect shield, Lethal chance increase, or Power steal.
effects: Random chance of: 12 seconds Reflect shield / 9 seconds Lethal chance boost / Steal 3 Power bars

passives.name: Power of Aton
passives.description: Black Adam's Specials can manipulate power.
effects: Immune to increases to Power cost of Abilities
75% chance to Stun on tag-in
10% Power boost on Special 1, per use. Stack up to 5 times
7 Power bars may be stolen on use of Special 3

passives.name: Courage of Mehen
passives.description: Black Adam drains part of the opponent's Power after tag-in. Also he has immunity to Power drain and Power steal, so when he is targeted by this type of Atttack, he drains the opponent's Power instead.
effects: Immune to Power drain and Power steal
Drain 40% of opponent's current Power
Drain 3.5 Power bars when targeted by a Power drain or Power steal attacks

passives.name: Strength of Amon
passives.description: On tag-in Black Adam temporarily increases his damage for Basic Attacks and his Tag and Dash Attacks reduce opponent's Health by a percentage. Buff duration increases for each oopponent's empty Power bar.
effects: +230% Damage for Basic attacks
3% opponent's current Health reduction on Tag and Dash Attacks. Maximum 40% Health per opponent per battle
+1.5 seconds for each opponent's empty Power bar

passives.name: Stamina of Shu
passives.description: Black Adam's Special attacks can become armor-piercing with a high Combo meter. Armor-piercing attacks dealt by Black Adam or Flawed Justice teammmates reduce the opponent's Power generation and Defense for a duration.
effects: Armor-pierce for Special attacks with Combo meter above 15
-15% Power generation and Defense for 20 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times

passives.name: Power Blades
passives.description: After using any Special Ability, Blue Beetle is boosted with shielding or Basic and Swipe Attacks that deal additional damage and effects. Only 1 effect active at one time.
effects: +100% Basic Attack damage after using any Special Ability

passives.name: Perfect Son
passives.description: Robin starts his Combo Meter with extra hits, increasing the bonus damage dealt from Abilities
effects: 7 hits minimum on Combo meter

passives.name: Aikido
passives.description: When Batman is hit by a critical attack or armor-piercing attack, he automatically crits or armor-pierces on all his attacks for a limited time.

passives.name: Blinding Strikes
passives.description: Each of Catwoman's Special Abilities temporarily Blind her opponent against Batman Ninja teammates.
effects: 50% chance for opponent's to miss against Batman Ninja teammates for 12 seconds

passives.name: 9 Lives
passives.description: When at low health, Batman Ninja teammates temporarily become immortal, preventing them from being knocked out.
effects: 9 seconds of Immortal whenever health drops below 15%

passives.name: Are you kitten me?
passives.description: Whenever Batman Ninja teammates successfully block a whole opponent Special, they gain part of its power cost. Additionally, if block is performed by Catwoman, her Special 3 is triggered at no cost.
effects: 60% of Power cost gained as Power bars

passives.name: Crippling Blow
passives.description: Batman Ninja teammates deal increased damage and temporarily lower opponent's damage and Defense on every 5th Basic and Swipe Attack.
effects: 450% damage bonus on every 5th successful Basic or Swipe attack
-30% damage and Defense for 14 seconds

passives.name: Dramatic Reversal
passives.description: When at 30% Health, Gorilla Grodd temporarily boosts his Lethal Attack chance and heals himselft for percentage of Basic and Swipe damage dealt.
effects: +60% Lethal attack chance for 14 seconds
25% of damage from Basic, Swipe, and Tag attacks heals for 14 seconds

passives.name: Master Plan
passives.description: Whenever Gorilla Grodd, Batman Ninja teammates or Legendary allies land an unblocked Lethal Attack, they gain power.
effects: 0.6 Power bars gained

passives.name: Ninja Sidekick
passives.description: If Harley is in your roster, all Batman Ninja heroes gain an additional percentage of Harley's base Attack and Health, without Gear, Talents, or Passive effects. Bonus activates in combat.
effects: +30% of this hero's base Health gained for Batman Ninja team if this hero is in your roster
+30% of this hero's base Attack gained for Batman Ninja team if this hero is in your roster

passives.name: Eternal Foe
passives.description: If Batman is on the opponent's team, Lord Joker revives up to two heroes from knockout.
effects: 35% Health restored to KO'd heroes

passives.name: Combo Kid
passives.description: For Batman Ninja teammates, at battle start and on each tag-in Robin adds bonus hits to the Combo Meter. Batman Ninja teammates' Combo Meter cannot be lowered completely.

passives.name: Ninja Lethality
passives.description: Each Lethal attack landed by Robin or Batman Ninja Teammates temporarily increases their lethal attack damage. Effects stack.

passives.name: Monkey Style Swordplay
passives.description: When Robin and Batman Ninja teammates are hit with a Basic Attack that misses, they temporarily gain Lethal Attack Chance. Effects stack.

passives.name: Force Field
passives.description: Damage from Basic, Swipe, and Tag attacks directed at Brainiac, his teammates and summons cannot get higher than a certain percentage of their max Health. Brainiac has to be alive for this effect to take place.
effects: Damage from Basic, Swipe, and Tag attacks cannot get higher than 2% of max Health

passives.name: Living Metal
passives.description: Brainiac grants himself, all Legendary heroes, and Summoned teammates increased Attack and Health. They also receive an additional percentage of Brainiac's Lethal attack chance and Lethal attack damage.
effects: +100% Attack
+100% Health
+170% Lethal attack damage
+170% Lethal attack chance

passives.name: 12th Level Intellect
passives.description: Brainiac hacks KO'd opponents and makes them fight for him in battle. Brainiac does not need to be tagged in for this effect, but cannot be KO'd. Hacked heroes are granted all Living Metal bonuses.
effects: 50% hacked hero's Health

passives.name: The Darkest Knight
passives.description: Each successful Special produced by the Batman Who Laughs produces Crisis energy. When the level of Crisis energy reaches its maximum, the Batman Who Laughs temporarily transforms into his ultimate form - The Darkest Knight. In this form, the Batman Who Laughs cannot perform Specials and is not affected by any timed buffs or debuffs, but his Attack is increased. Each 4th attack against an opponent reduces their Health by a percentage. Health reduction ignores Defense, but can be affected by Blocking or Passives.
effects: 16 seconds in the Darkest Knight form
+400% Attack
2% opponent's current Health reduction on every 4th successful Basic or Swipe attack
Maximum 40% Health per opponent per battle

passives.name: Ultimate Despair
passives.description: The Batman Who Laughs can interrupt opponent's Specials by performing his own using Crisis energy instead of Power. This applies permanent Despair defuff on the opponent, reducing their damage. Only Specials of the same or higher rank can be used for interruption.
effects: -25% Damage under Despair debuff
Up to 3 stacks
Use Special for interruption using Crisis energy for 45% of original Power cost
Crisis energy cost gets rounded, but cannot be lower than 1 bar

passives.name: Master Manipulator
passives.description: Using Specials and Supermove with a high Combo meter grants the Batman Who Laughs extra Crisis energy.
effects: +150% Crisis energy
Combo needs to be higher than 18 hits

builds.name: Damage Dealer Alternative Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: Devo and edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 2x DEF, 2x CAD, 1x CAC, 1x RES; 7th talent: RES

passives.name: Dead Water Infection
passives.description: The Drowned infects the opponent with successful Basic and Swipe Attacks, reducing their healing effectiveness. Batwoman increases damage from Metal teammates' attacks and Hazard DoT from all teammates per each Infection stack on the active opponent. Each 4th applied stack produces Crisis Energy.
effects: +4 seconds of Infection on successful Basic and Swipe attacks.
Infection: Opponent's Healing effectiveness decreases by 5%. Stack up to 15.
For each Infection stack on the current opponent, all Hazard DoT ticks deal 9% more damage and all Damage from Metal characters is increased by 19%
Each 4th applied Infection stack grants 1.25 Crisis Bar

passives.name: Ultimate Hydrokinesis
passives.description: When the level of Crisis Energy reaches its maximum, The Drowned uses her devastating hydrokinetic powers to resurrect Metal teammate and flood an entire level with her Ultimate Hazard.
effects: 700% of The Drowned's Attack stat as Hazard DoT for 16 seconds
Resurrect 1 Metal teammate per activation. Max 4 resurrections per match
Resurrect Metal teammate with 86% health

passives.name: Crisis Engineering
passives.description: The Drowned can power up her Specials by spending Crisis Energy on them in addition to Power. By tapping the Special button for the 2nd time, her Specials will also create a Hazard DoT.
effects: 140% Attack as Hazard DoT on Special 1 for 7 seconds
180% Attack as Hazard DoT and 6% Max Health restored per second for all teammates on Special 2 for 8 seconds
220% Attack as Hazard DoT and disable all opponent's Specials on Special 3 for 9 seconds

builds.name: Damage Dealer Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 3x CAD, 1x CAC, 1x DEF, 1x RES; 7th talent: RES

builds.name: Lethal Build w/ Dark Metal Cards (G70, 7⭐)
builds.description: DMC is assumed to be level 10 with 3 Lethal Attack Damage bonuses
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom

passives.name: Batman, Inc.
passives.description: If Classic Batman is in your roster, all Batman and Classic heroes gain a bonus to their Attack and Health when they enter combat.
effects: +35% Attack for Batman and Classic teammates if this hero is in your roster
+35% Health for Batman and Classic teammates if this hero is in your roster

passives.name: Classically Trained
passives.description: If Classic Batman is in your roster, all Batman heroes gain a bonus to XP awarded from battle and when using XP capsules.
effects: +70% XP bonus
+70% XP capsule bonus

passives.name: Power Seize
passives.description: When an opponent misses an attack on Classic heroes due to being Blinded, the team gains Power. Additionally, Batman aids the Classic team by empowering their Rush Attack with Blind.
effects: 1 Power bar gained
55% chance to apply Blind for 8 seconds after using Rush attacks. 50% chance for opponents to miss under Blind

passives.name: Titanic Strength
passives.description: Each use of Superman's Specials deal additional damage to tagged-out opponents and decreases the defense of the current opponent for the remainder of the battle.
effects: 16% of Special Attack damage to tagged-out opponents
-35% current opponent's Defense

passives.name: Power of the Sun
passives.description: Active Classic teammate heals from Power Boost. Power Generation is not considered a Power Boost.
effects: +14% max Health healed for each Power Bar actively restored

passives.name: Tough Skin
passives.description: All teammates are granted an increase to Defense.
effects: +40% Defense for team

passives.name: Absolute Zero
passives.description: When he is the active combatant, Captain Cold has a chance to disable opponent's Special 1 or 2. He also grants his entire team Critical attack resistance.
effects: +50% Critical attack resistance
100% chance to disable a Special

passives.name: Claws of Death
passives.description: After performing any of her Abilities, Cheetah gains armor-piercing on all attacks for a limited time.
effects: Abilities give armor-pierce on attacks
Special 1: 4 seconds
Special 2: 6 seconds
Special 3: 8 seconds
Supermove: 10 seconds

passives.name: Strength of the Amazonian
passives.description: Wonder Woman and her teammates gain extra Critical Attack damage based on their current Defense. Can exceed cap.
effects: +2% Critical Attack damage for every 1% of Defense
No more than 100% above cap

passives.name: Wisdom of Athena
passives.description: Wonder Woman and her teammates gain extra Critical Attack chance against Blinded opponents. Can exceep cap. Deals extra damage against Blinded opponents.
effects: +50% Critical Attack chance against Blinded opponents
No more than 23% above cap
+200% Attack against Blinded opponents

passives.name: Believe in Wonder
passives.description: If Classic Wonder Woman is in your roster, all Wonder Woman and Classic heroes gain extra chance to roll Rare and Epic talents, with chances doubled at max level.
effects: Increase the chance to roll Rare and Epic talents by +100% in slots 1 through 6
Increase the chance to roll Legendary talents by +100% in slot 7

passives.name: Twist of Fate
passives.description: Doctor Fate's team's Abilities require less Power (does not stack with similar Passive abilities).
effects: -10% Defense for opposing team
-2 to team's Power bar cost for Special abilities

passives.name: Parademons
passives.description: Improves Health and Defense of summoned Parademons and increases how many Parademons can bee summoned per battle. Parademon stats are a percentage of Darkseid's stats.
effects: 100% Parademon Defense
60% Parademon Health
3 Parademons per battle

passives.name: Sacrifices Are Necessary
passives.description: Teammates who lose more than 15% of max health over 1 second gain an absorption barrier for 6 seconds with a 5 second cooldown. When any hero, including a summoned Parademon, is knocked out, Darkseid regenerates Health and gains Attack for the rest of the battle. Effects stack.
effects: 30% Health absorbed
30% Attack absorbed
Barrier for 500% of current Health

passives.name: Apokolips Bombardment
passives.description: When tagged out, Darkseid commands Apokolips to bombard the battlefield. Apokolips deals damage and can interrupt opponent Special Attacks and bypass shields.
effects: 100% chance of firing
80% damage
8 second intervals

passives.name: Kryptonian Slam
passives.description: On tag-in, Supergirl lands an unblockable attack that deals damage and can interrupt Special abilities. If she interrupts a Special ability, she gains 100% damage and 100% Critical chance for 7 seconds.
effects: [80% of Attack stat] damage tag-in attack

passives.name: Expert Mercenary
passives.description: Every Special enhances Deathstroke's attacks with a temporary buff. The same type buffs stack up to 2 times.
effects: 10 seconds duration

passives.name: Steady Improvement
passives.description: Every successful Special permanently increases the duration of Expert Mercenary buffs. Duration can be increased by 100% during the battle.
effects: +20% buff duration increase

passives.name: Weak Spots
passives.description: When Deathstroke Critically hits he gains Power.
effects: 0.5 Power bars gained

passives.name: Antihero
passives.description: When hit by an Ability, Bane enrages becoming unblockable for a limited time.
effects: 6 seconds unblockable duration

passives.name: For the Corps
passives.description: Green Lantern creates various constructs to help teammates on battle start and tag-in. Green Lantern buffs first with Stun, then randomly with Power bar gain, auto-Crit attack, or Stun.
effects: Hammer: 3 seconds Stun duration
Lantern: 2 Power bars gained
Sword: 100% Critical attack damage

passives.name: Entangling Vines
passives.description: Poison Ivy's Special abilities Bed of Thorns and Root Pound disable Evade, Ranged, Rush, and Jump attacks of the opponent for a limited time.
effects: 6 seconds of movement disable and Swipe attacks disable

passives.name: Toxins
passives.description: Until Poison Ivy is KO'd, Basic and Swipe attacks dealt by League of Anarchy teammates do additional damage as DoT.
effects: 75% additional DoT on Basic and Swipe attacks

passives.name: Regrowth
passives.description: While Poison Ivy is the active combatant, she heals herself and her League of Anarchy teammates for a percentage of DoT dealt.
effects: 50% of DoT dealt heals

builds.name: Balanced Healer Build (G70)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.gear: 1x ATK, 4x FAC, 3x DEF, 3x CAD, 2x HLTH, 2x CAC

passives.name: Energy Absorption
passives.description: Starfire regenerates a portion of her Health per bar of Power spent by her current opponent. Also, upon using her Starry Night Supermove, she heals her teammates.
effects: 5% Health regenerated per Power bar
5%-20% Health regenerated for team after performing Supermove

passives.name: Disruptive Spores
passives.description: Successful Specials used by Elder Swamp Thing apply a Disruptive spore on the opponent for a short period of time, after which it explodes, dealing damage. Spore damage increases with each negative effect on the opponent and Specials performed by Justice League Dark teammates.
effects: +500% of Swamp Thing's Attack stat as spore damage
+40% spore damage for each unique negative effect on the opponent and for successful Special performed by Justice League Dark teammates. Stacks up to 6 times
20 seconds spore duration, when the maximum number of damage stacks is reached, duration is reduced to 5 seconds

passives.name: Inner Growth
passives.description: Upon spore exploding, Elder Swamp Thing heals himself and his teammates based on the damage dealt.
effects: 80% of spore damage converts to healing for Swamp Thing and his teammates

passives.name: Green Resonance
passives.description: On tag-in, Elder Swamp Thing gives himself and Justice League Dark teammates a temporary damage boost and an Absorption shield.
effects: +100% Justice League Dark team's damage for 20 seconds
Justice League Dark team Shield (35% of Elder Swamp Thing's max Health)

builds.talents: 3x RES, 1x AP, 1x DEF, 1x CAD; 7th talent: AP

passives.name: Poison Vines
passives.description: Ivy's Special abilities Vine Drill and Datura Hammer disable Evade, Ranged, Rush, and Jump attacks of the opponent while inflicting poison DoT for a limited time.
effects: 6 seconds of movement disable, Swipe attacks disable, and DoT

passives.name: DoT Resistance
passives.description: Firestorm and his teammates gain an increase to DoT resistance.
effects: +50% DoT resistance for team

passives.name: Athena's Power
passives.description: Wonder Woman grants her team an increase to Attack and Defense each time they lose more than 50% of their total Health. This buff stacks up to 3 times and lasts for the entirety of the match.
effects: +50% Attack
+30% Defense
Up to 3 stacks

passives.name: Divine Protection
passives.description: Wonder Woman has increased DoT resistance.
effects: +85% Damage over time resistance

passives.name: Offensive Guard
passives.description: Diana has a chance to increase her team's Combo meter when she successfully blocks incoming attacks.
effects: +100% chance for each blocked attack to increase Combo meter by 3

passives.name: Supremacy of Reason
passives.description: Superman and his Legendary teammates have a chance not to reset their Combo counter with their Specials.
effects: 60% chance not to reset Combo counter

passives.name: Side Effects
passives.description: Superman heals when his teammates receive damage. He gains bonus damage each time they lose a certain percentage of their total Health, up to 4 times. This buff lasts for the entirety of the match.
effects: Heals for 50% of damage his teammates receive
Gains +50% bonus damage each time teammates lose more than 50% of their total Health

passives.name: Better You Than Me
passives.description: Superman spreads portion of the damage he receives between his teammates when his Health drops low.
effects: Spreads 50% damage he receives between his teammates when he has less than 60% Health

passives.name: Circuit Breaker
passives.description: Grid has numerous advantages over Tech opponents, especially Cyborg.
effects: Immune to Power drain
Immune to Stun from Tech opponents
Disables all Cyborg opponent's Passives at battle start
+25% Power generation per Tech opponent
+300% damage for Special 1 and Special 2 against Cyborg opponents
Losing more than 15% Health over 1 second from Basic and Swipe attacks a 200% current Health Shield for 10 seconds. 3 seconds cooldown

passives.name: Box Full of Evil
passives.description: Incoming DoT will heal Hellboy instead of damaging him. Against Arcane class opponents, Hellboy gains boosts to damage and Defense.
effects: 100% of DoT heals instead. Maximum of 3% Health per tick
+25% damage and Defense against Arcane opponents

passives.name: It's Not Me, It's You
passives.description: Teammates targeted by Stun attacks gain a chance to reflect them, stunning the attacker instead. Harley also increases Hero XP earnings for all combatants within the same Roster.
effects: 75% for the team to Reflect stuns
+18% XP bonus

passives.name: Let Your Guard Down
passives.description: Heartbreaker Harley Quinn reduces the opposing team's Stun resistance and DoT resistance.
effects: -70% opposing team's Stun resistance
-75% opposing team's DoT resistance

passives.name: Straight to the Heart
passives.description: Until she is knocked out, Heartbreaker Harley Quinn and her teammates deal increased damage on opponents while they are stunned. Critical Hits against Harley and League of Anarchy teammates are greatly reduced in damage.
effects: +300% damage against stunned opponents
120% Critical damage multiplier reduction for League of Anarchy team

passives.name: Fear Aura
passives.description: Scarecrow's Aura makes opponents panic. The opposing team has reduced Attack and opponents' Abilities require more Power.
effects: +2 to opposing team's Power bar cost for Special abilities
-10% Attack for opposing team

passives.name: Tactical Analysis
passives.description:
Hush is a skilled fighter, who can switch between two stances, using his Emergency Surgery ability. By using Perfect Shot and Bullet Storm he also temporarily applies stackable Nemesis mark on his opponent, which adjusts stats depending on a stance Hush is currently in. 
Assault stance: Hush's Attack, Critical Attack chance, Critical Attack damage, Fast Attack chance are increased against opponents with Nemesis mark. Defense, Blocking, Critical resistance and DoT resistance of such opponent are decreased. 
Secure stance: Hush's Defense, Blocking, Critical resistance, and DoT resistance are increased against opponents with Nemesis mark. Attack, Critical Attack chance, Critical Attack damage, Fast Attack of such opponent are decreased. 
Hush always starts the match in Assault stance.
effects: -15% of opponent's stats
Up to 4 stacks
+10% of stats for Hush

passives.name: Expert Marksman
passives.description: Upon activating Supermove, Hush applies Nemesis to each member of opposing team.
effects: 3 Nemesis stacks upon Supermove activation
5 seconds Nemesis

passives.name: Misdirection
passives.description: Hush has a chance to reflect damage from Special he is currently blocking back to the opponent.
effects: 60% chance to reflect 60% damage

effects: 30% Health restored to KO'd hero
100% chance to Armor-pierce on Basic, Tag, and Swipe attacks for Justice League team

Ignore damage from opponent's first Special Ability for Justice League team

passives.description: All teammate hazards deal increased damage. Teammates take less damage from hazards and are immune to hazard secondary effects (including disabled, stun, and hindrances to power). All Green Lantern teammates gain increased attack.

effects: +25% Power generation per Might opponent

passives.name: Interruption
passives.description: On tag-in from Multiverse teammates, Supergirl lands an unblockable attack that can interrupt Specials. If she interrupts, she immediately gains Power bars.
effects: [25% of Supergirl's Attack stat] tag-in attack
4 Power bars gained

passives.name: Overload
passives.description: Teammates targeted with Power draine regenerate Health for each bar of Power drained. Power cost of opponent Abilities increases per use against Multiverse teammates.
effects: +5% Health regenerated per Power bar when Power is drained from the team
+1 Power cost of opponent Abilities per use against Multiverse teammates

passives.name: Tactical Strikes
passives.description: For each active buff from a Multiverse teammate, Kate's Special attack damage is increased, to a maximum of 150%.
effects: +30% Special attack damage per active Multiverse buff

passives.name: Tactical Prep
passives.description: Batwoman extends and stacks the duration of all Multiverse buffs applied to her.
effects: 15 seconds added to Multiverse buffs

passives.name: Combat Focus
passives.description: Kate Kane gives her entire team a chance to keep their Combo hit count from resetting when hit.
effects: 90% chance for team to ignore Combo hit count interruptions

passives.name: Cold Barrier

effects: +100% Armor-pierce chance resistance if this hero is in your roster

Per use Special ability bonuses stack up to 5 times
Immune to Freeze

+45% team Critical attack damage

-1 to Multiverse team's Power bar cost for Special 1

effects: 3 Tech Specials ignored per battle

passives.name: Multiverse Power Drain

51% chance to transfer 50% of Power drained to reserves for team

passives.name: Endurance Training
